title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The saveAs function in the software forgets to include the file type and the icon for the saved file changes from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When using SaveAs function, the file is saved without any file extension and the icon for the saved file changes from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed. The icon for the saved file should remain the same as the parent javafile icon.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog box will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location to save the file
6) Type the filename without including the file extension
7) Click Ok

Observe that the Navigator displays the file in the specified location, but without any file extension and with a generic file icon.
